name: Vision Space Inc.
description: Developer of digital twin technology that allows for fast, cost-effective 3D modeling, simulation, and real-time monitoring of factories and logistics centers using AI-powered 3D generators and editors, enhancing productivity and reducing costs through optimized industrial robot operations and remote control.
one_liner: Developer of digital twin technology that allows for fast, cost-effective 3D modeling, simulation, and real-time monitoring of factories and logistics centers using AI-powered 3D generators and editors, enhancing productivity and reducing costs through optimized industrial robot operations and remote control.
